column2:
get_summary_n <- bind_cols(mins, means, medians, maxs) %>% 
  rename(variable_name = 1) %>% 
  select(variable_name, contains("value")) %>% 
  mutate(notes1 =
           str_c("Min: ", value...2, ", Mean: ", round(value...4,1), ", Median: ", value...6, ", Max: ", value...8)) %>% 
  select(variable_name, notes1)

New names:
* name -> name...1
* value -> value...2
* name -> name...3
* value -> value...4
* name -> name...5
* ...
